title: FCF Pay unleashes 3 powerful steps for broadened cryptocurrency bill solutions
description: In a groundbreaking move, Canada’s FCF Pay has expanded its cryptocurrency support, ushering in a new era for digital asset payments. With the inclusion of XRP and Shiba Inu (SHIB) in its platform, Bitcoin miners and other users can now conveniently settle their electricity bills using a diverse range of cryptocurrencies.
